name: Meteor Invaders
description:
The year is 3896. You and your crew went on a journey to find aliens. But then, you were mysteriously separated from your crew. But, things only got worse. You were stuck in an endless meteor zone. The meteors keep coming in as you try to dodge and survive.

Your objective is to survive as long as possible by collecting powerups and avoiding meteors. There is no way to live forever.

This game was made for the 1 - Button Jam.
